title: â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸
body: This app is a good, fast, and sufficient way to lose weight, watch your diet, and stay fit. I loved how the the app was set up, it's all organized and very easy to find everything. The one thing I had a problem with was that I'm allergic to fish and they kept suggesting salmon. I don't know how to do that.  But other than that the app was superb.

title: Awesome app but....
body: I love this app! It is amazing for calorie counting. I would like to see more metrics for instance I don't always see when I'm measuring a cup, tablespoon, teaspoon. Also I did pay for this app because I loved the idea of it synching to my Fitbit. It does not do so accurately. For instance I worked out for an hour tonight burned 458 calories according to my Fitbit, I did synch it to Lifesum on Lifesum it says I only burned 229. I am NOT happy I paid for this app. Since the metrics and synching with Fitbit is not accurate.
response: Please feel free and contact us with more details at contact@lifesum.com so we can start investigating your issue. Thank you!

title: Great app! Love how I can customize a diet plan that fits me
body: Much easier to use live the interface and how it has recipes and keeps me on plan.  I upgraded to the full version, no regrets!

title: I've lost 12lbs!!!
body: I'm using this app everyday and have lost 12lbs, like it a lot! Tracking your food is the way to go, you can find lots of food by searching in the database! To "Good job google" I think you should enter the height in inches not in foot. :-) To the people behind this, thanks for this app!

title: Great!
body: Great app. Easy to use. I have used it for two years. It took 9 months to lose about 35 pounds and I've managed to keep it off. I agree with others about the reliability of some of the numbers. I do appreciate the healthy recommendations in the upgrade. The earlier version recommended an unhealthy daily calorie goal. Thanks for the great product!

title: ShapeUp review
body: I really enjoy this app. It's easy to enter foods & other data and I really like the charts. I like seeing the progress at a glance and it keeps me on track. My only recommendation is after a typed food search entry a window should come up to ask if you want to make it a Favorite.

title: Bugs and Glitches
body: I love this app, and it's very helpful. However, I have some issues with adding my food to the log. The barscanner doesn't seem to work and creating a new food item that doesn't yet exist on the app is very difficult and most of the time won't even work. If you could fix this up it would make the experience a lot better.

title: Overall great app!!
body: It's very easy to track food and water and exercise. I would like it if the graph for tracking your weight had all the way down to your goal weight on the y-axis instead of just your current weight. It would be nice to have that visual. Also, on the keto diet it counts dreary fiber for carbs, which you don't do on the keto diet.

title: I love the visual guides
body: This is so great and I look forward to getting so my first milestone with the app! This visual for each food item is great, and definitely does assist in me getting to know what foods are best for the particular diet I choose (I.e. Ketogenic extreme). I also like that it allows you to track your water intake.

title: Won't open
body: The app is completely updated on my iPhone 7, yet every time I open it the app closes within seconds.  I love this app, but it also doesn't subtract fiber from carbs giving you an inaccurate carb count.  At least make this an option for people!  It's great for deciding which foods to eat but right now the current version won't even allow you to do that.  Fix these issues and this app gets 4 or 5 stars!
response: We deeply apologise for the issue! The team has already found the reason for the problem and is working on a fix for it. A new version with the solution will be published as soon as possible!

title: Great nutritional info!
body: This app is really teaching me to eat smaller portions and healthier food. I've been using it for about a month now and have already started losing  excess fat without working out! My only suggestions are to add a shortcut to add water intake and a widget for the lock screen.
response: Thank you very much for your feedback!

title: 2 for freezing 4 for features and usability
body: I like how this app looks and the features it offers but I have problems with it working and running properly every other day or so. To fix it I have to uninstall and then reinstall it. I have been using it for one week and have had to do this three times now. I would most likely pay for the premium platform if these problems were fixed.
response: A fix has just been launched. Please update your app and check if you are still experiencing any issues. Thank you very much!

title: ðŸ‘ðŸ¾ðŸ™ŒðŸ¾
body: Update: I've gotten into the habit of using this app everyday. Love it 99% of the time and despite some buggy versions, quick fixes and overall performance make it exceptional.
response: A fix has just been launched. Please update your app and check if you are still experiencing any issues. Thank you very much!

title: Awful!
body: I have had this app on my phone since 2009 and found all upgrades to be helpful, until now!  The newest version is awful!  All of my favorites are gone, all of the foods I created are gone, I can no longer copy from a previous day, which was so helpful.  This version is difficult to use.  I tried it for a few days and its not growing on me.  So I'm going to use another app I found.  Go with something else and stay away from this!  Some things don't need fixing or upgrades.

title: Beautifully crafted
body: I make apps for a living, and there's very few that live up to the standard of LifeSum. It's gently playful while still making it extremely easy to do everything you need. I've been a huge MyFitnessPal fan for years, and LifeSum stole my heart after 5 minutes.

title: I love this app!!!
body: I just started using this app. It is very user friendly . I live that you can scan barcodes into the app and it writes  out the info for you. This app has truly motivated me to loose weight this time for good!! I have been trying for over 15 yrs now !! Thank you Lifesum.

title: Great App
body: Easy to use.  Needs to add far more foods and companies that offer weight loss foods/shakes.  Add exercises and ability to edit calories burned from places like Orange Theory Fitness.  Is recommend the application as it provides great information on foods and tracking when you meet your goals.

title: Must pay for upgrade to get useful tools
body: Well, it looks like it might be a useful tool in one's pursuit of a healthy life, but I'll never know because everywhere I turn in the app it asks me to spend money to upgrade to use the functions I need. At the least, they ought to make all features available for a one-month trial before charging you money. I'm not paying only to find that it doesn't meet my needs. Very disappointing.

title: Makes a difference, lost weight
body: Tried this app, logged daily food intake and learned where my diet was failing me. I was consistent in logging info and have lost 18lbs in less than two months. Very satisfied. I recommend you fully commit and watch the weight loss begin.

title: Beware!
body: Would like to try this app again but it is a scam. I purchased the gold and they will not help me to restore the purchase. It shows up in my apple subscription and everything. I had someone helping me. He said to try the password he gave me. When I said it didn't work, I have no response. So I've emailed again to him and to the company with no results. I want either a refund or some support. $40 for an app is expensive, especially if it won't let me log in and use the features!

title: The jury is still out.
body: Many of the exercises I type in, the app doesn't know what they are. And I am not sure how big a serving of vegetables counts as one broccoli icon. However I did get a good idea what I was doing wrong food wise. First time I found out I was shocked. Overall I am happy with it.

title: Love it
body: I really like this app. It allows me to track calories and macros to make sure I'm keeping myself on track and meeting all of my goals every day. If you pay extra I think it's like $3 per month, they offer a bunch of healthy recipes to try. It's a really great app!

title: Very Content
body: I downloaded this app and had issues with crashing. Upon sending a review and mentioning my issues the developer promptly answered. The app is functioning well at the moment and I would definitely recommend it to other. Wonderful app.
response: Please contact us at contact@lifesum.com and we will look into this!

title: Love this App
body: Works great! Easy to use, the online search for food is quite useful, may be time consuming in the beginning but once you start adding foods to your database or tag them as your favorite it moves along quickly, I've lost 10 lbs, only 5 more to go!

title: Down 6 kilos in 5 weeks
body: It's positive and helpful on understanding what I need to do to keep loosing weight. The free part is good enough for me because of my background with nutrition science, but I'm sure the pay portion is good for those who have a hard time figuring out what is tasty and still meets their goals. Love it!

title: Great amazing app! My favorite
body: I love this app, it has helped me to track my nutrition and lose 20 pounds! The only thing is hat it keep changing my birthday? Also when I put in any food occasionally it tracks the calories as 0, or just a far less number than it actually is. So I have to delete it and add another one. Please fix!

title: Fantastic way to check your eating patterns!
body: I had no idea how much of anything I was eating, just worked out and kept moderate eating habits. This site has helped me realize how little protein I eat. I've been using the free version for about a month and I'm going to upgrade.

title: Great app
body: Easy to use and the most accurate. I have combined this app with my fitbit and I am proud of the results I have achieved thus far..( Weight loss, portion control, meal plan).

title: Works and doesnt work
body: I was immediately pretty impressed with what it could do but it needs improvement - like the foods you choose. There are duplicates in the lust but some it marks as healthy and others not. You can't see why without the premium.

title: Helped so much
body: Helped me loose the weight in a healthy way. Super easy to use as well! I believe counting your macronutrients is the way to loose weight not through a diet and this app helps with that. I highly recommend this app even if you don't buy the full version.

title: Really good!!
body: I was starting to eat healthier and workout more with other apps. Those apps let me document what I did, that's it. This app tells you what to eat and how to workout. When you document what you did it gives you a face with your day, and emotion, telling you what you did wrong and right. I love that aspect of this app.

title: Highly Recommend!
body: In past calorie watchers, I never entered in my food. I put it off. I love Lifesum though. It's like they are there and actually care! They gently push you to enter your meals. And this is the only app that I've never missed a daily entry! 10/10 recommended! Best one there is!

title: Great App!!
body: I absolutely loooove this app to track my macros. I've been doing it for a month and it has helped so much with staying on track. I also have an Apple Watch so it helps showing the calories I've burned as well. Absolutely love it and highly recommend it!!
response: Thanks you so much for your positive feedback! We are very happy to read that you are satisfied!

title: Excellent!
body: I'm using this app to track my eating and have lost 6kg! Nice! It's really easy to add food and exercise and most food is already included in the database. To "imoeris" I'm using this app to track in Metric System, it works perfect. You can switch between imperial and metric in settings. :) Thanks for this app!

title: Lots of potential...
body: This app is so close to getting it right. The custom diets, easy interface, and reminders/encouragement had me really excited about the app.

title: Tricky
body: I wanted to try the gold membership for one month to see how much I used it. I was thinking if I liked it I would continue the membership. Something went wrong in purchasing and I ended up with the year membership. I have emailed them to help me correct the error and have yet to hear back. It's an alright tracker program. Nothing more special than others I've used. Although I do like how it incorporates with my Fitbit. I just feel a little like they tricked me into more than I wanted.

title: Great but..
body: I loved mostly everything about the app, but the grading is a bit strange. I would have 4 A grade foods in a meal and 1 grade C and get an overall of D, or I would have a day filled of grade A and B foods and get a day's grade of C or D. I know that I shouldn't look at that and be discouraged, but it's a bit difficult to think you've had a great day and have something with a few grams of sugar and be given a poor response!

title: Love this app!
body: I love how quick and easy it is to log food and exercise with this app. Overall, it is a great way to track your progress. The only complaint i have is that it suggests I have 154 g of protein, which is triple the amount that is recommended for by myplate or any other normal diet. i don't like getting rated "E" on my meal because im not a body builder!!

title: Easy and fast to use!
body: Every food that I've scanned with their barcode has registered, so that's definitely a nice feature! Everything is quick, easy and accessible! It's super easy to add workouts and different exercises. I'm really loving this app!

title: Great
body: Overall just a great app for tracking calories to help you lose weight. The free version is adequate for what I needed, but for someone who wants to track more extensive things (like fiber and such), you might feel the need to upgrade. A good app and it serves its purpose.

title: Love ... but
body: I love using this app.
response: Thanks for letting us know. The water tracker and its settings are not a part of the premium package no. Could you contact us at contact@lifesum.com and tell us some more details about your problem, then we can fix it in no time for you ðŸ™‚

title: Helped keep my weight in check!
body: This helped me keep my weight on track along with loosing a couple pounds. I was able to make sure I wasn't starving myself by trying to eat less, even better made me eat more but with healthier meals. Thank you Lifesum.
response: â¤ï¸

title: Okay, but a big problem
body: I like that you can do a lot with it without having to pay for a premium version of the app, but it's not funny when you go to track calories and the app opens and crashes within 15 seconds. It was working fine the first day I had the app, but now it's the second day and it will not stop crashing.
response: A fix has just been launched. Please update your app and check if you are still experiencing any issues. Thank you very much!

title: Without Weight Watchers Points, it's a WASTE!
body: For 6 weeks, this program was my life as I started the new year off on weight watchers. I spent hours tweaking my options, developing meal plans and putting in my points. The results were amazing! Then the software update came along and took away points! Without the points option or the equivalent of it, this program is absolutely useless! Find a way to bring it back or sign a deal with Weight Watchers to license legally. You will make a fortune! The demand is HIGH!

title: Perfect!
body: Does exactly what it's meant for. Tons of food choices and it's very organized. I only wished they don't limit so much stuff to those who'd pay, but I completely understand why such a good app would make you pay some money for more features.

title: One Happy user
body: Been using it for two year snow and am very happy with it. Lost almost 60 pounds so far. Have another 20 to go. I've gone off it twice so far and as soon as I stop counting calories I start to gain slowly. The secret is to keep portioning the food and counting the calories. Thanks ShapeUp.

title: Great App
body: I love this app. It makes tracking so easy, and I love how encouraging it is, even if you go over your calories by a bit. I also love that it gives you an idea of how many calories should be in each meal. Wish I would've found this app sooner

title: Keeps me motivated
body: This app has changed my entire diet/exercise routine! I am on the ketogenic diet and working out 6 days a week and I only have the motivation to stick with it because of Lifesum! The diet is super challenging but helps me hold myself accountable. I recommend Lifesum to everyone that I know!!

title: Good, but...
body: I bought this app initially to watch calories. The app is actually very good, and I defiantly recommend it. When I decided to buy gold, the premium version though, they had a 50% off sale on 6 months. It wasn't true, and I spent 3 hours with apple support that night. In summary, it's a good app, just beware of its sales.

title: Best health app I've tried!
body: Discovered Lifesum after trying lots of other fitness tracking apps, and enjoy it more than any of the others by far. Easy to use, love the interface, and love how it syncs with other apps like Apple Health and Runkeeper. Use it every day!

title: Good but...
body: It's a really great app but I wish there were more features for the free version. When I first got the app, they would give me my daily rating ( happy face, okay face, bad face) but now they took that away and only Premium members get that and it's kinda annoying.

title: BEST APP OF ITS KIND
body: I'm not one to write reviews, but I had to for this app. It is by far the best and most effective lifestyle app I've ever used. The design is pleasing to the eye, making it fun to log in food or water or exercises. This is the main reason I love this app, among many others. Highly recommend!! Thanks Lifesum!!
response: WOW! Thanks you so much for your positive feedback! âœ¨ðŸ’¥

title: Great at first
body: I loved this app soooo much when I first got it. It's helpful and really easy. Until about 2 days ago when I started the free trial of premium. It just completely stopped tracking my steps and calorie burning. I thought it was something wrong with my phone but it did the same thing to my mom on her phone! This app is so great but incredibly frustrating.
response: We are very sorry for the issues with Health right now. The team has started to rebuild the whole connection between these apps in order to solve teh different problems that are being reported. We apologise and thank you for your patience!

title: Great App
body: I was a little skeptical, but after trying the free app I upgraded to Gold. Love that I can pick the ketogenic diet with choices of how many carbs a day. I don't have to count calories and that it grades my food choices to make picking something better for myself easier.

title: It's ok
body: I like this app. I have the gold version and it really helps me to know if I'm doing it right. But, I agree with previous comments that there's no enough space for healthy snacks, when actually you have to eat every 3 hours.

title: I like it!
body: Today is my first day using LifeSum and I was surprised at how bad my eating habits are. I got quite a few 'C' grades for my meals and I was actually trying to follow a low carb diet. It's interesting how little we know about food and diet. Anyways, I look forward to using this app and so far I am hooked.

title: Takes forever to connect my Fitbit
body: It will only update my Fitbit info (calories burned) twice a day. Once in the morning time and once at night. It makes it EXTREMELY difficult to plan meals since I don't know how many calories I have burned until I'm already done eating for the day! Someone please fix this so it updates more periodically throughout the day!

title: Love Lifesum
body: This app is great! I love all of the posts give feedback as I add foods and activities throughout my day. I love that I can connect it to other apps to track my fitness.  I thought no it would be nice to be able to have a way to bulk add ingredients in the recipe feature AND be able to import recipes from websites.

title: A Good Calorie Counter
body: When I count calories, I don't expect to be on the dot accurate. I definitely think that Lifesum is interactive and a good guide to beginning to record meals and dietary habits. A constructive thing I might add to the app is the ability to edit items, meals, foods added (interns of nutrition tables).

title: Love it!
body: This app has helped me keep track of what I'm eating. It seems silly but seeing the little smiley face when I have a healthy meal really motivates me! I don't want to eat bad because I don't want to see the frown! Haha! I wish the premium version was free as well but overall love the app.

title: LOVE!
body: I'm a teen and trying to lose some weight and just live healthier in general. This app is super helpful mainly because it's easy to use! I love the smiley faces that rate your meals- makes me feel guilty when I eat a doughnut for breakfast vs my normal oatmeal, and that's the encouragement I need! The exercise tracker is awesome two!

title: Simple, easy app!
body: I don't spending time counting my calories but this app allows you to do it quickly and efficiently! I like how it gives you a life score, so I can continue eating the same meals. I would buy the premium if I wasn't a broke college student!
response: Thanks for the nice review ðŸ˜Š

title: User friendly but not really a monthly subscription
body: So far I like the app, food list is decent but certainly not exhaustive. I would love to buy the premium but it is advertised as $3.75 a month, but instead you have to pay all of it up front, close to $50. If the subscription was really a monthly payment option I would get it.
response: Thanks for the review and the feedback! We're happy that you like the app! We're sorry if its unclear, if you want any more assistance with your subscription contact us contact@lifesum.com.

title: Like the program, could use some minor additions
body: Used the program only 2 days now.  I like the daily charting and disply.  It's an app worth $10.  Having said that, I do wish you could create separate profiles and weight loss plans.  The preloaded foods needs to be expanded as well, perhaps a tie in with the restaurant app allowing the calorie info to import into your daily count.

title: Great app
body: This is a well designed and very functional application. I have been using it for three weeks and I open this more than any other application I have. Plus it has helped me lose 10 lbs. My wife wants an iPhone just for this application.

title: I want my points back!
body: I LOVED this App until today. I am doing Weight Watchers and loved the way this app tracked my meals and workouts. Even if my food item wasn't in the database there is an easy way to add your own food by entering calories, fat, fiber, carbs, protein, etc. I have lost 15 pounds since Feb. 1st using weight watchers and this app. I LOVED it, until the new update today took away the ability to track points! Does anyone know of a good app that tracks points like this one did? I am seriously so disappointed!

title: Would be better if...
body: I like the presentation, but frankly I like MyFitnessPal's food database a lot better. It would be nice if this app would allow bidirectional sharing of nutrition info with other apps. A key advantage of HealthKit, in my opinion, is to allow users to get the best combination of features thorough multiple participating apps. No information silos. LifeSum isn't quite there yet, for me anyway.

title: Great app!
body: Easy to use. You can even scan a product barcode to get calories info! Great calories tracker. The free version also let you track fat carbs and protein. I haven't tried the gold version , but it is really amazing as is. I totally recommend it !

title: LOOOVE IT
body: Seriously love this. My sisters and I got apple watches for Christmas this year and are all working to lose weight for my wedding in June. This app is so helpful and it allows us to share it with each other! I love the reminders and that it cheers you on, even if you're forgetting some entering!

title: Spotty app on both phone and watch
body: They don't seem to sync properly on both devices and every time I add a bottle of water info on my watch, it gets deleted immediately. I can't delete info either cause the data will still appear on both devices or one device. It's so sad since the app has potential. I'll pay for a premium if it actually works across on both my phone and watch.

title: Overall good app
body: Overall good app and it encouraged me to buy the annual membership. Question for the developers: it seems like the data from the Apple Watch activity and iPhone activity app get added up together in the calculation of calories burnt when they are the same thing. I noticed that this translates to calories burnt count that is higher than reality
response: Please feel free and contact us with more details at contact@lifesum.com so we can start investigating your issue. Thank you!

title: A bug and premium
body: I really enjoyed this app for the past couple of days- then it started freezing my phone when I opened the app. I don't know what it is, but fix it. I like that I can track my meals and see my intakes, but a lot of the stuff on here is purchase-only a.k.a. $34 premium. I am aware that this is normal for health and fitness apps but 90% of the app is for premium only.
response: We have just launched a new version that will solve this issue. Please download the latest version from the App Store. Should you still experience any issues after the update, please contact us at contact@lifesum.com

title: Buggy to where its unusable
body: I love this app and the UI is great but the latest version has been buggy to where it's almost unusable. Adding a previous days meal causes multiple entries and tediously having to manually delete them. And the app freezes or crashes at least 20 times a day. I've sent multiple feedback reports and emails to let the developer no but I've received no follow up or reply. Makes me reconsider my yearly fee for going "premium" for a broken app.
response: A fix has just been launched. Please update your app and check if you are still experiencing any issues. Thank you very much!

title: Excellent
body: This app has helped me so far to lose over 10lbs in 7 weeks. It is simple to use and even though it took time to adjust the food database, it has definently been worth the efort. Having a export option like Spent and Spent lite would make it perfect.

title: Hinders Basic Functions
body: This is a fantastic app, easily five stars, except for the way it pushes you to subscribe to a gold membership.

title: Beautiful but....
body: They price it like a SaaS not a mobile app. $8.99/mo for one month of Gold. Or $36 for the full year. Kinda outrageous compared to other apps. It's a pretty and ok app but not worth that. ESPECIALLY because the calorie counts are all over the place and not accurate. You can only create 2 meals if you don't have gold. Overall: looks - 5 stars, nutrition data - 2 stars, price - 2 stars, UX - 4 stars.

title: Good app, keeps crashing though
body: Great app, I really like it for calorie counting. Can be a little hard to pick out which food you want to choose because they have a BUNCH of options but not all of them are what you have and you can only add a couple foods on your own. But a really great and encouraging app.

title: Thorough!
body: Lifesum is a total product. The food database has complete options, the tracker is user-friendly and even the sounds (like when you add water) are motivating. It also cuts you some slack if you have a bus day and can't track.

title: It works
body: I use this every day to track what I eat and my exercise. I love how it tells you what the recommended calories, fat ect are per day to lose weight and how it adds and subtracts your allowance of those recommendations. Great app! Highly recommend!

title: Great!
body: I think this app is great! It's easy to use and I love the style of the UI. I would like to make a suggestion though. I think that there should be a widget for iPhone that makes it easier to add information to the app, like add glasses of water or even a scanner.
response: Please feel free to vote for your request directly here: https://lifesum.uservoice.com/forums/274566-feedback-ideas/suggestions/16315147-bring-back-widget-on-ios

title: Totally changed the way I look at food!
body: Through the little emojis, I am having fun while learning how to make better food choices. I highly recommend it to anyone wanting to make a serious lifestyle change.
response: Thank you very much for your feedback!

title: Perfect app for Macros and convenience!
body: FIVE STARS!!!
response: Thanks a lot for your feedback! We are very glad to hear that you like our app!

title: This is a great app for helping you track what you eat
body: I've had this app for about three months now and use it daily. It integrates well with Apple Watch and the Apple Activity app. It makes tracking your food and water intake easy.
response: Thanks you so much for your positive feedback! We are very happy to read that you are satisfied!

title: Not so great with the points.
body: Works pretty well...except it cant seem to do the addition correct.  I am trying to use points instead of calories, but it can't seem to add the numbers up.  It must be doing to some rounding behind the scenes with halves.  But it is very annoying since it doesn't show the halves with the food.  Just stick to whole numbers.

title: Monthly vs Lifetime One payment
body: I hope the developers are reading what â€œfansâ€ of your app are asking for.

title: AWESOME!!
body: First day and this app is already changing my life! It's cool to see when you're making good choice and the food grades, as well as when you upgrade and you can see recipes! I can't wait to make a lifestyle change for the better! Thanks Lifesum!

title: I think it wants me to drink a glass of water.
body: Every 3 seconds it comes up with some justification to notify you to drink a glass of water. Just woke up? Drink a glass of water. About to eat? Drink a glass of water? Going to bed? Glass of water. Tying your shoe? Glass of water. Taking a shower? Glass of water... I see you drank some water, better follow it up with a glass of water Etc. etc.

title: Should Be Removed From The App Store
body: Outside of looking great, this app is terrible and unreliable. The automatic exercise tracking, meal information, and calorie info is so WILDLY inaccurate and incorrect that you'll only be hindering your health progress by using this app. The LifeSum team needs to continue to develop this app and provide accurate information to its users and paid subscribers. This is peoples' health we're talking about here! How can you be comfortable providing people with so much erroneous data?!?

title: SCAM!!!! DO NOT USE!!!!
body: I saw this app appear, read about it seemed descent so I bought the 'gold' membership.  This was almost a week ago. Purchased the membership for $6 or so. It said that it would renew at $20 in 3 months May 4th was my renewal date and at that time I would be charged $20, cool no problem let me test drive the app. This morning I get an apple receipt thanking me for my renewal purchase of $20. So in a week Ive spent close to $30 on a an app. Lifesum, thank you for taking my money you freaking liars!!!!

title: Not helpful.
body: I've been using this app for almost a year now and today, after updating the app, I'm done. The newest features prevent me from logging my meals in one setting so I can't plan my meals out. Also, I workout in the evening or before breakfast not afterwards so I cannot log my lunch until I make up some fake workout. I really hope this is just a glitch and not how the app will function going forward, otherwise I'll be going back to my old meal logging app.

title: Great app
body: Lifesum is a very useful app when tracking meals for weight loss. It's simple to use, the recipes are great, and the post are informative. No matter what I eat it's listed and that makes meal variations possible to post. I've tried similar apps for health and wellness but Lifesum by far is the best!!!
response: Thanks you so much for your positive feedback! We are very happy to read that you are satisfied!

title: Awesome
body: The app is a dream! My husband and I use this daily, it's just a part of our lives now. It's helped us find holes in our diet, as well as track things like water intake. Lifesum puts other similar apps to shame. I absolutely recommend this to anyone
response: Hey dear user, We've released a new version 8.5.2 where the crash is fixed. All the best, Lifesum Team.

title: Slow and buggy, but better than the rest.
body: Update 8.6.0:
response: We are very sorry for the inconvenience! The responsible team is already working hard on a solution. Thank you very much for your patience!

title: Nice App
body: Nice app - does what it says. Very helpful and easy to use. Check out their video - it answered my q's before I purchased the app. Some recommendations - can you add additional measurement field, i.e. arm, thigh or the option to add addtl measurements; a notes field would be nice too.

title: Better than lose it
body: I like this ap so much better than lose it. It's more user friendly, it tracks more than just your weight and it has an online function option for searching products in addition to the reg data base. I'm happily surprised.

title: Cumbersome to use everyday
body: The app is well designed and the barcode scanner is able to understand most foods. However, if you eat similar foods each day you can't copy them from the day before, you have to start from day one each time which is a major chore.  Similarly, there isn't a good way to adjust servings sizes when food is entered. The app has potential but it needs work.

title: Missing much needed features
body: I love the interface but it's limited even with the premium subscription. I would like to see support for 3D Touch, the ability to put in our own recipes, a much wider database of food choices or the ability to manually add foods. Much of the nutritional facts are inaccurate especially when it comes to sugars.

title: Number 1 health app
body: I love it ! But I love the previous version better :) categories were easier and the latest version for iPad is not so good ... It needs some fixes, like profile, is not working. But thank you lifesum for food ratings. They are awesome ! ;)

title: Great App!
body: Love that you can customize according to the diet you would like to follow. Only wish they had the advanced option of 5:2--intermittent fasting so I could properly calculate my macros. Instead I'm following the macro and calorie count of the fat burner light program.

title: Love it!
body: I like it a lot more than my fitness pal because it gives me a grade and for some reason I'm less likely to cheat or anything because grades matter to me. So if you're a fat nerd like me and you don't want to gain the freshman fifteen, I highly recommend this one:)

title: Great App
body: I love the app, it helps me track my food intake. I personally do not believe in calorie counting, but logging my food intake helps me keep track of how much food I eat and therefore I am eating less. The app needs some improvement, I don't like the "buy premium" part, but I guess that's normal. I def recommend the app!

title: One of the best things that's happened to me!!
body: This app is soooooo awesome!!! Please please try it out! I wouldn't tell you wrong! And it's free! I'm going to join the premium version because it helps you out soooo much on weight loss journeys, counting carbs, encouraging others, and so much more!!

title: Disappointed
body: I thought that meal plans as advertised for premium membership would have actual plans with more than 5 recipes and actual suggestions. In addition, this app is extremely buggy and freezes almost every time I open it. It is frustrating to not even be able to log my meals or activity without it shutting down my phone.
response: The fix has just been launched. Please update your app and check if you are still experiencing any issues. Thank you very much!

title: Awsome!!!
body: Well worth the price, it is amazing ha everything I need and the interface and graphics are great. Has room for improvement but I gave it 5 stars because the developer is involved and is really taking into consideration what the users want, way to go!!!

title: Gets better and better
body: It's great that they keep fixing the little issues with this app. I'm kind of obsessed with it.

title: Love this App and it's easy to use!
body: I use this App on a daily basis and not only do I stay in great shape and health, I also learn a lot about food and what I eat. The only downside is that there's so much food out there to keep track of but I use the "create own food" feature a lot to be sure I get the right nutrition facts.

title: Beautiful & simple!
body: I have used many dieting apps before & Lifesum has been my absolute favorite!! I won't ever use another app. It's beautifully designed and easy to use. I'm gluten free and a lot of apps don't have a great selection of gluten free food to input. Lifesum has so many! I love it.

title: What I've been looking for.
body: Lifesum is exactly what I've been looking for in a nutrition app. Works smoothly with Apple Watch & Apple Health. Super simple to use. I love all the options it gives. I upgraded to the gold plan, and I haven't regretted it once. I couldn't be me e happy with it.

title: User Friendly
body: Easy to get started, not difficult to maintain. I only plan on using the 'free' version, and that is plenty enough for me. Helps keep me on track with what to put in my belly, and reminds me of what I could improve on

title: Don't let other reviews sway you
body: This app is great. I've had two other calorie/diet trackers since last September. This is hands down the easiest, comprehensive and accurate one thus far. I haven't encountered any problem yet either. 5 Stars.

title: Dysfunctional
body: Unfortunately the app doesn't work as well as it could. I can't create new items by entering all the nutrition information  and I don't understand why this isn't available. Also when I scan new foods if there is 0 grams of sugar it will say I have missing information and won't give a grade, super annoying. Wish I hadn't paid, if it fixed these things I would love it

title: Keeps exiting out
body: This would be an amazing app, but every time I get on it, it exits out of the app completely. It's hard to track and log my calories and food intake if I can never even stay in the app for more than five seconds. Kinda disappointed because otherwise I would have given this app a five star ratingðŸ˜•

title: Major thumbs up!
body: I love that it gives you different lifestyle options! I am on Keto and it really adopts to your diet plan once you put in all the info. Only thing it doesn't do on Keto is subtract the fiber, its counts it as whole. But its easy just to subtract it yourself!

title: Great App, Needs Improvement
body: I like this app a lot but I can't get around the bug of it erasing the info I put in when I try to add a new item. I would also like to suggest a points calculator for those of us who are on weight watchers and a badge that shows the remaining amount would be nice too. I am putting this app in reserve in hopes that improvements can be made. For now, I'll have to stick with my cheaper, iTracker.

title: Can't Live Without This
body: Love the app and use it all day long.  The only improvement I'd like to see is a built in body fat calculator. To track this data along with my weight and waist measurements, I need to go to another source.  Keep up the good work!

title: Okay
body: I really liked lifesum when I first got it, so I got a gold star account. I still think the app needs some work though...I'm having a problem where all of a sudden all of the food i am entering for today is showing up in tomorrow's log! I don't want to be constantly recording food on the wrong day, so as far as I'm concerned this app is now useless to me. It was really nice at first and had a nice interface but ultimately too many glitches and a disappointment :(

title: Best meal tracker out ther
body: I've tried them all and used MYFitnessPal for a while but this app goes above and beyond anything else. Simple to use, beautiful AI and tracks what you need to know. I haven't paid for the premium but offers alternative meal plans for a small fee.

title: Great and easy to use
body: Nice and great UI/UX. Easy to use. I've been using this app for 4 days and like it so far. Sometimes it's hard to calculate foods that are not in the list. Also, they could be more precise when adding exercises. Other than that great app.

title: New to ketogenic. This is a must get app
body: I started ketogenic diet 6 weeks ago for a health issue and have found this app to be great for tracking my food and making sure I get the correct balance of fat, protein and carbs. Thanks for keeping the monthly price reasonable.

title: Track all my meals and workouts
body: So easy to use. I track my water, food and workouts in seconds. The barcode feature is great and save me a lot of time on new foods. Also the history on adding foods is great two clicks and Im done tracking. A+

title: Great Concept, Poor Execution
body: I'm on the Premium plan for 45 bucks a year. The apple watch app is buggy.. I can't enter water and it record the value. On the iOS app I can't seem to easily enter in custom nutrition if needed. Super obvious feature, folks. And, the support page renders no help and isn't readable on my iPhone 7+. The left side text is running off the screen, never to be seen again. I'd like my money back.

title: Could be better
body: I log all my food for the day and right on track. I will log out of the app and when logging back in all my numbers have changed and I'm short calories carbs and protein. It's really frustrating. Also there should be an option on how many meals you'd like to break you food down into daily not just breakfast lunch dinner and a small snack at the end of the day

title: Healthy beginner friendly
body: Seriously one of the most user friendly and accommodating apps I've ever used to manage progress on my diet. I love that it rates what I eat and tells me what I need to improve on. This app is so helpful I can't even believe it's free. ðŸ‘ðŸ¼ðŸ‘ðŸ¼

title: So far, so good!
body: I love that it helps me affirm my daily water intake, and has an archive full of snacks, and meals to choose from when on the go! I can accurately track calories, and make food choices no matter where I am and see progress and patterns. Love it!

title: Love this!
body: I love this app, so easy to use and I can track everything even when I'm in a rush. I especially love how it can link to my apple health app, the only complaint I have is that it doesn't like my exercise to my health app. Otherwise this would have gotten a 5 star rating from me.

title: Very nice app to keep your calories in check
body: Love the app. Especially like that it's not only about calories but also about healthy and balance diet. Only thing I would suggest is to allow user to add customized workout. Over all, great app!

title: Relevant, useful and easy!
body: This is the best app I have used to track my food plan, water, exercise to date. It allows customization but also provides direction relative to specific eating programs as well as recipes to accompany .

title: Great app!!!
body: I love this app!!! I've been using it only a couple of days now but it helps me make better food choices. It's frustrating sometimes because get such bad grades on what I eat, I just don't know how to choose properly.

title: Awesome except...
body: This app is so much friendlier than MFP in regards to a ketogenic diet. However, I wish the developers would add a recipe import function. It would make it so much easier to add recipes!!!!

title: I lost my money :/
body: I bought a three month plan and suddenly the app was extremely slow. I couldn't load a single page even after closing it all the way down. So I deleted and re-downloaded it. But when I logged back into my account all my progress, plans, etc. was gone. Along with my money. Also, the plan was supposed to be only $7.33 but when I checked my card records, the app charged me $23...? So I am very irritated at the moment ðŸ˜‘

title: Fantastic and Beautiful!
body: I've always been pretty active, but I'm awful at keeping track of what I consume. This app had literally everything that I've eaten including the specific brand of protein powder and milk that I consume! Love this app, keep up the good work fellas.

title: Wish I would have never purchased
body: I have it set to standard and not metric yet all the recipes are giving me ingredients in mg and ml. They are not helpful at all if I can't see them using cups, teaspoons and tablespoons.

title: Amazing
body: I highly recommend this app to anyone who needs to gain/lose weight or even just be healthy. I personally am overweight sand having this has not only encouraged me to lose weight it has truly helped me lose weight

title: Sadly not all that...
body: First this app seems to be in its infancy stages.  Maybe later on it will get better but for now I'm frustrated I upgraded to GOLD right away and now I'm not going to use the app, here's why...

title: Very Useful, I use it daily
body: Great way to track calories and macro-nutrients. Comes with a vast library of meals/foods as well as exercises, but the ability to search for food / meals online and create your own food or exercise makes this app a must-have!

title: good so far
body: I'm still very new to the app (I got it yesterday), but it works very well so far and the layout is sharp and easy to find my way around. although most of the features are restricted unless you pay for a membership, the free version is still very functional

title: Awesome!
body: I love love LOVE this app! I found it and said to myself "I'll try this out and see what happens", little did I know it would work! I have currently lost  9 pounds and counting! If you are looking to gain muscle, lose weight or stay the same, this is the app for you!

title: Good App, but not enough options for free version
body: This app is fun. It has great visuals and is pretty easy to use. The only thing I have a problem with is how little you can get for the free version. I understand that you want us to get the premium version, but having just a few more options for the free version would be appreciated.

title: I love this app
body: This app helped me lose weight I had been trying to find an good app to help my keep track of my workouts and meals and the rest wouldn't work and this app is the only that would work for me personally

title: Great!
body: Overall I love this app! I love how personalized you can make your meal plan and account. The format of the app is super user friendly too! Although I wish they had more food options that can be logged, sometimes it doesn't recognize items that it should.

title: Good ðŸ™‚
body: I love that the app has emojis in the side to tell you if you're doing good and asks for the weight and how organized it is but it's hard searching up what I ate because where I'm from  and some stores I'll get a meal I'll search the map up and it's not there on Lifesum so I try to make it simple as possible but it sometimes doesn't get it

title: Still not getting it right
body: My calories burned are still randomly decreasing, even after doing more exercise. But what's more frustrating is that it syncs with the health app but doesn't include the steps from there in the times of exercise anymore. Also, this app no longer syncs with Runkeeper so any runs I do no longer get logged automatically. I've tried reactivating, restarting the device and reinstalling the app, all to no avail.

title: Decent tracker; still a bit buggy
body: I love the growing inventory is for nutrition values, makes it easier to keep accurate accounting of food intake. There are issues with my running app double counting with the built in pedometer on my iPhone. Also, it keeps freezing on me from time to time.
response: A fix has just been launched. Please update your app and check if you are still experiencing any issues. Thank you very much!

title: Nice UI
body: The UI is pleasant. Over all layout has its issues. For example I generally log 1-3 meals in one moment. To add them to its respective meals I need to go in and out 2 levels..to me the worse flaw. Layout over all is portly arranged and over complicated.

title: Has it ALL!!!
body: Not only does this app sync with my iWatch, but it has an amazing selection of foods to choose from, as well as a great variety of exercises to log as well. It syncs with my Endomondo account as well. Which means all my exercise is automatically recorded! WAY TO GO!

title: review
body: I am a practicing Family Medicine physician who has found this product to be extremely helpful in the management of obesity. We face a national crisis with obesity related disease. certainly tools like this help my patients understand their dietary habits, and where the problems lie.

title: Amazing
body: I have the free version and it's amazing. I have been hearing a lot about flexible dieting without really understanding it. Now with this app it makes total sense and everything is so smooth and easy. I already gained 1 pound of lean mass. I am completely addicted!

title: Loving it... needs more options
body: I love this app, I just wish more foods were already in the database or there was a more efficient way to manually enter foods, their nutrition, and edit details.

title: Waste of your hard earned money!!
body: The UI of this app is awesome! It's very easy to enter in your data, but for some reason I don't trust it... You can't edit your food diary; let's say you accidentally add a recipe to your diary. There is no way to remove it.  Can't wait for my membership to expire and that's the only reason I keep the app installed. Because I paid for the "Gold Version".

title: Love
body: I've recommended this app to all my friends, I love it. The only thing that needs to be changed is a lot of the food that is scanned in has an incorrect calorie amount. I have reported multiple items, hopefully they get fixed, then I would give it 5 stars.

title: Something wrong with 10-31update
body: Hi. Please correct wherever we done in 10/31 big fix.  Step count is out of control all of a sudden.  Doubling up watch and iPhone over and over.  Used to right on the money.  Please fix asap.

title: First Day
body: Today is my first day using the app so I am finding my way through it.  So far I love it.  I love the fact that you can scan the barcodes of food and it provides immediate feedback on your choices.  Time will tell.  If I continue to use it - anyone can be motivated to use it!!!

title: The Facts
body: I have used Lifesum for about a month now and I definitely recommend it!

title: nice app
body: it took time for me to go through the information. I have never kept track of food and this is the best with graphs,charts, being able to add new food, pictures. I already have my friends hooked. Thanks.

title: Slimming down!
body: this app is so easy to use and I use it multiple times a day. I love everything abbout besides where you can't change the carbs and fat in the custom food it would really be nice to be able to change that so it doesn't look like 90% of my day is carbs.

title: Very helpful
body: This is a very helpful app for being healthy and losing weight.   I have tried many of the free apps and I like this one the best so far.  I did not purchase the gold.  I think it would be nice but I don't need all of that.  The free stuff is very helpful!

title: Outstanding tool for weight loss
body: I am in the process of taking off over 100 pounds. I use this simple tool not only for weight tracking, but as an easy to use food journal...which is a critical factor in my weight loss effort.

title: ðŸ‘ðŸ½
body: Super fun and easy to use! Only have had a couple of days now, saw a sponsored add on my Instagram! Already have told multiple friends about it! Will definitely be getting the full version for only $4 a month! Great deal, great app!

title: Awesome app!
body: I already love this app more than My Fitness Pal which I use several times daily. I love the interface and LOVE the grade of the food. This app is great and as soon as I can I'm upgrading to premium. Much better price than MFP's price with much more features.

title: App not user friendly
body: I'm very disappointed in the app. I signed up for a year Gold membership and the app turned out not be so easy to use. Don't be fooled by the free app. Buying a membership won't give you that much more advantage. Also I could not get past the daily tips to actually log any food or activity. Then when I asked for a refund they sent me to ITunes support. I'm still waiting for my money back from this useless app.

title: Great but needs options
body: This app is really easy to use and has a good deal of foods in the database. I wish it had the option to turn off the day rating and I'd like to be able to use it to track the every other day diet instead of just 5:2.

title: Amazing appðŸ¶
body: Lifesum has helped me so much with getting back on track. It's very helpful with tracking my food and made me more aware of what I'm feeding my body. I found this app very useful in helping me get fit again. It's a definite must have app.

title: Great, but ....
body: Similar to my fitness pal, but different - obviously.

title: Love it but...
body: Since I updated my phone to 3.0 I haven't been able to add in my own time for the excercises - for example when I enter my own time like 20 minutes I will hit back and it kicks me out of the app and back to the home screen it needs to be fixed asap!

title: Easy tracking of calories & exercise
body: LOVE this app--helped me lose 18 lbs and I still use it for maintenance.  It's really remarkable to see how many calories you are consuming every time you eat something--it helps you make healthier decisions.

title: Love this app
body: I have used many different apps of this sort and have found this one to be my favorite. Easy to use, helpful notifications, and has a layout that I love looking at. Highly recommend.

title: Need Support! Problem with update
body: Absolutely love the app, get design and they layout is manageable and easy to deal with.

title: Seems great so far!
body: I switched for myfitness pal to this app. I've only had about two weeks, and so far I really like it! Considering upgrading to Gold but concerned. I've seen some good reviews and bad about gold. I'm a single mom, in nursing school; so while 2.99/month isn't much, it is if it is wasted!

title: Best app I ever tried for sure!!!
body: Very useful, a extremely appealing app. I love how it keeps things very simple and organized not unlike other apps I've tried, I use it everyday I it has helped me a lot tracking my progress so far.

title: Really good
body: Very helpful for health because it can be used keep most of the data about the food your eating and the amount of exercise you do. It also provides healthy alternatives and meal suggestions.
response: Thanks a lot for your rating and feedback!

title: Wonderful app
body: I've been using this app for about 6 months! I love it. Only thing that's tough is sometimes what I've eaten isn't in the app and I haven't figured out how to enter it so I can track it! Also wondering how to change the amounts as well! Otherwise I love it! Super easy to use!

title: Steps from Health not syncing to Lifesum
body: The steps from Health app are not syncing to Lifesum app- saying I've burned 0 calories all day!! This is the reason I deleted another health app and installed Lifesum, because the other app had this same problem. Please fix!!!
response: We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing that issue!

title: Good concept, too many glitches!!
body: I got the app due to a makeup guru recommending it. It doesn't let me finish adding food when the app closes and I have to start all over. I also noticed that the calories in the app do not match those on the product box. If this app didn't have all those glitches and if it would let me out in food without closing it would be great!
response: We apologize for the issue you are experiencing. Please feel free and contact us with more details at contact@lifesum.com so we can start investigating your issue. Thank you!

title: The best one
body: I love this app, the design is very pretty,  it has nice features, very helpful.

title: Almost a good thing...
body: Beautifully laid out, great tools for tracking food and habits. That being said...

title: Great but lots of room for improvement
body: I love the app and it has great potential but there's a lot of features such as an "add drink" feature, a better scanner, and more accurate data and more products added to the list,much more exercises. otherwise it's awesome

title: Love it!
body: This app has really helped me with loosing weight. I like how they can select a diet that's just right for you. Since I'm going to be doing track as well as volleyball this has helped me maintain a healthy weight so I can be better at my sports.

title: Love love it!
body: I used MFP for years before switching to lifesum. I love the UI here so much better, it seems cleaner and easier to navigate. Also loving the recipes and helpful guidance. Best of all it seamlessly connects to my Apple Watch to grab activity, steps and calories burned. Fantastic!

title: Consistently Getting Worse
body: App started off well enough with some bugs. But now app consistently freezes. And the biggest gripe is it won't save when exercise and water is logged in; or will save on the wrong date. The second you close out app and reopen, exercise info that was previously logged disappears. Extremely frustrating! Either revive previous, better working version or fix current bugs.

title: Great so far
body: Was having issues with getting enough/correct calories while cycling and this has helped a lot. No longer feeling like I need to eat all the sugary things in the house late in the afternoon.

title: The premium update was TOTALLY worth it.
body: I have had trouble reaching my ideal weight for a while, and I knew what the problem was. This app is wonderful for helping self control, especially if you are motivated by a clean, pleasing aesthetic. Great recipes, all around 5/5.

title: Awesome!!
body: Really helped me to track my calories and goes into more detail about how much protein and all that I need a day! It's really helped me to lose weight!! Also the water tracker is super helpful as well, and I completely recommend!

title: Needs some work
body: The UX design is really nice and user friendly.

title: My favorite calorie tracker
body: Easier to use than others. I like the combined online database which allows me to find foods others jave added so I don't have to. Would like to see an option for entering entire recipes.  Love it

title: I LOVE this app
body: I use this app everyday. Just by counting calories, I've lost 8lbs since the beginning of the year and am making better food choices! I never realized how much junk I ate during the day until I started using this app. Awesome!

title: Not fun to use
body: I think it is a nice app because it counts protein and carbs at the same time it counts calories but the database for food is frustrating to use. It definitely needs a barcode scanner and better description in food database so that we know we are choosing the right food we are eating. I just found it time consuming to search for the right food...maybe other people won't mind.

title: Great app!
body: I super love this app. Very user friendly and motivating! The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was due to the limitations on the free version. I understand the desire to keep some options available for premium members only, however at least make the recipes free. Overall great app.

title: The best
body: I've tried many apps of this kind and this blows the rest away. Easy to use, yet feature-rich. I'd be hard-pressed to come up with any suggestions for improvement.
response: Thanks a lot for your rating and feedback!

title: Good but has bugs
body: I just created an item that had 80 calories per serving. It saved it and all seemed well, but when I went back a minute later it said the item had 79 cal per serving and I can't find out how to change it back. :(
response: You can edit self-created food items under ME / FAVORITES in the app.

title: Premium
body: This is a great app but with this new update, determining if overall I ate well for a day is now I premium feature. The reason I liked this app so is much is because there were still many great things available without needing a premium membership, and now that doesn't seem to be true.
response: Behind Lifesum stands a team with more than 50 employees and these running costs have to be covered.

title: Sync with Fitbit
body: The app has a clean and attractive layout with a very comprehensive list of your macronutrient intake. My only complaint is that it only syncs your steps/calories burned, but not your food/water intake with Fitbit. I'm hoping an improvement on this issue will be present on the next update.
response: Thank you for your feedback! Please feel free to vote for your request directly on Uservoice where we collect all user feedback like this: https://lifesum.uservoice.com/forums/274566-feedback-ideas/suggestions/8130921-automatically-export-food-log-including-more-than

title: Good app but could use improvement
body: The like the concept of the app but logging the food part is kinda sucky there isn't very many options. Especially paying for it, it isn't really worth the money as a member. I did 4,000 steps and it logged it but said I only burned 1 calorie which isn't right. I've had that happen to me more than once, needs to improve.
response: Please feel free and contact us with more details at contact@lifesum.com so we can start investigating your issue. Thank you!

title: Great when it works!
body: I loved this app and have been using it for 4-5 months now.  It was user friendly and convenient. HOWEVER, it has some major bugs and it keeps crashing.
response: A fix has just been launched. Please update your app and check if you are still experiencing any issues. Thank you very much!

title: Fun and easy way to track calories
body: It is the easiest to use out of all the apps like this I've tried. The pay stuff really isn't needed unless you need to track nutrients. The other pay features can be worked around if you don't want buy in.

title: Awesome app!
body: Beautifully designed, easy to use and incredibly helpful to track your health. It has everything: barcode scanning, integration with other systems and nutrition plans. Easily the best calorie tracking app out there.

title: The best tracker
body: By far the best app to track food and water consumption, as well as exercise, very quickly and accurately. The design is clean and functional, and it'll be incredibly handy to have an iWatch companion app to go with the already easy iPhone app.

title: Amazing App
body: I love the barcode feature so I can scan my food/snacks!! I'm not sure why people are having such a hard time deleting items as I've had zero issues. The app is just incredible ðŸ‘ðŸ‘

title: LOVE IT.
body: It's amazing. I think that if you are looking to get healthier or lose weight or both you should use this app. Great for keeping track and will tell you how many calories you need to eat lose weight.

title: Ratings
body: Love the app! It helps me stay on track and teaches me what are good choices for my diet plan. One thing I wished it had... to be able to search food ratings so I don't have to constantly get frustrated in finding what I can and can't have! Yet over all, still love it ðŸ˜Š.

title: Excellent Apple Health Companion
body: Maybe I'll sound made up for this, but this does more than I wished for and I'm all the better for it. A healthy recipe collection! It seems this system has been streamlined well. Would recommend

title: Has me working for smiley faces!
body: It's funny how a the type of smiley face I get makes me curious enough about my choice of food to make a switch or two. Lost 5 pounds so far. Tracking my food seems to be a major part of the process for me and this app makes it a little more fun.

title: It's great but could be better!
body: The app is really good, but it would be a lot better if you could add some more nutritional information in it, like the types of fats, vitamins etc. Would make me feel a lot better about buying the year subscription.

title: Good app but won't stop crashing!
body: I decided to try this app out and I like it..I paid for 3 months to get a diet and I'll probably cancel when I'm done cause it's useless to me. Only annoying thing is that I can't ever input anything because the app crashes non stop!!!

title: Love the interface, but Calorie Count is free for the same features
body: Interface is fantastic. However, you can use the same pay for features with Calorie Count for free.  I would actually happily pay a one time price to use this app, but not a membership.  Calorie Count isn't as pretty, but it has all the features you need.

title: Like
body: + convenient & easy way to count your calories. When I have to note everything I've eaten, I eat less!

title: Obsessed with his app
body: I can't believe all of this is free. it's an awesome tracker, you can even scan barcodes to add your food, interface is easy to use and has a fun look. this app has me highly motivated to finish my health goals!! love it

title: Love it!
body: I love this app! I upgraded to the gold membership and I'm very happy that I did. Very easy to use, has a lot of foods and exercises that other apps do not. Very fast response to questions. Love how you can keep up with your water intake!

title: Not good for dietary restrictions
body: Giving it two stars because the idea is great, but I couldn't find any way to accommodate for dietary allergens/restrictions. Thus the meal recommendations will not really help someone with Celiac's (like me) or another allergy as there are no substitutions or preferences to help personalize this for you.

title: Great App
body: Has great data base, good quality info, love the rating foods - very helpful, easy to use and sends reminders about drinking   or logging meals but does not give grief when I go over the plan!!!!! Enjoy having  it in my phone and IPad!!! Thank you!!!

title: Love it!
body: Can't believe it's free thank you guys, been so helpful in keeping me on track and motivated. Not sure why but I think just breaking things down by meals has really helped me to finally start tracking.

title: I used to love it...
body: I used to love this app before it updated! Now I have no way to track my calories and my water intake. Please fix the issue or I'll have to start all over again on another app.

title: Very helpful!
body: This app is perfect if you are you're trying to be more aware of what you're putting in your body and make better choices. I like that it's free and that you can do it with friends.

title: Amazing app
body: This app has 3 choices loose weight: gain weight : or be healthy . I am trying to gain weight and it helps it gives you awesome recipes on foods and drinks and helps you track all of your meals . Download it it's amazing you won't regret it .

title: Perfect ap!
body: This ap is great. Yes, you do have to enter food item but it's not that hard, and is perfect for people like me that are always on the go and just need to keep track of everything to reach my fitness goals. Love it!

title: Easy
body: I've just started using this app to make me aware of bad eating habits. When I go over my daily caloric intake, I'm able to balance out by adding more  exercise. This app uses positive wording and makes keeping a food diary fun.

title: Great app
body: Syncs with the activity app on the IPhone to count steps and exercise data. Large database of various foods including protein bars that it reads with the camera by scanning the barcode. Even some chain restaurants are listed such as Red Lobster detailing the calorie content in their meals.

title: Love it
body: This app is genius. I've used it for about a week. I should upgrade by now but don't know if I want to pay monthly yet. Still testing it out. But I definitely recommend it. Real quality stuff.

title: Best calorie tracker
body: I was using a different for months now and decided to check this one out. I'm glad I did because I love it. It's easy to keep tabs on your food and exercise. I like it better that myfitnesspal

title: Review
body: love the app, but there is minimal access to features unless you upgrade, and to upgrade you have to pay the 1year subscription up front and pay all 12mo in in full. Wish it was a monthly fee so I could try it out and cancel if I needed to. Bummer

title: Amazing!
body: This app has helped me so much on my journey to losing weight. I've lost almost 30 pounds so far and I think it's the best tool for someone who wants to become a better version of themselves. Five stars from me!

title: Inaccurate calories
body: All of the calories are off by at least 1. I had a 100 calorie protein yogurt and it logged it as 99 calories. Some things I scanned would show up in myfitnesspal but wouldn't be recognized in this app. They need to fix these issues before I would think about purchasing it.
response: These are probably bugs, please contact us at contact@lifesum.com and we will look into this!

title: Great app
body: Easy to understand/use. Yummy recipes, too! This app is helping my family slim down for my brother's wedding Oct. 2018 and it's a great way to keep each other motivated, even when we're in separate parts of the US
response: Thanks for your kind words Amanda â¤ï¸

title: Changed my life
body: I Love lifesum! With its help, I have managed to lose over 60 pounds since the start of the year! Great interface, good motivator. Best $40 I ever spent!
response: Hey dear user, We've released a new version 8.5.2 where the crash is fixed. All the best, Lifesum Team.

title: Absolutely love this!
body: I love that I can change the calories!! I bought a calorie tracking app and I was soo mad that I couldn't change my own calorie budget! It said I needed to eat 2300 calories a day but if I do that I GAIN weight so yeahh this is wayy better!!

title: Love it!
body: The only thing is that I wish it had more exercise options like stairmaster/climber, ellipitical trainer, etc... Also, that the menu is updated. Chick-fil-A serves breakfast now but there's no breakfast menu in the app to choose from. I'm sure they'll have an update later for it though. Other than that, L-O-V-E I-T!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Keep healthy and live life fun with lifesum!
body: Ive been using this app for a few days and I love it! Way better than myfitnesspal, it encourages you to make better choices on food selection, I think that is my favorite attribute.

title: ALMOST Perfect.
body: I switched over from Lose it! To this app with high hopes. From what I've seen so far, this app is very simple and gives great tips about water consumption, snacks, etc. I really think they could change a few things and fix a few bugs, but overall it is a great app and I use it daily.

title: Awesomesauce
body: This app is pretty wonderful for tracking your meals, providing you with data on your macros, keeping up with hydration, and logging those workouts! I've only had it 2 days, but loving it so far.

title: Almost Perfect!
body: I use this religiously, it makes dieting more rewarding for myself personally.

title: Awesome app!ðŸ’ªðŸ½
body: One of the best apps I've ever used to count my macros, such a good way to keep everything tracked! My favorite part is where we can scan all the food we eat making it ten times easier!

title: Service links
body: Hi, I'm trying to link my Fitbit account to my lifesum account to track steps but the app won't even open up another page like the rest of the links you have in the services tab. If you could please fix this bug that would be awesome. Thanks again for making a great app.

title: Lifesum
body: Helps track my calorie in take & the amount of water I consume! If you're chubby like me and not taking into account your serving size this help will sure help you understand the error of your ways. Loveeeeeeee it !

title: Awesome app for high fat very low carb diet
body: This is the best food tracking app I've ever used.  The app picks up every barcode I scan which saves so much time.  Their plans offer ketogenic options which are hard to find.

title: Great app
body: I love this app for a few reasons. It makes calorie counting easy, you can also record your daily exercise, and if you're looking to drop some lbs, you can specify how many and Lifesum will make a "daily calorie goal" for you to help achieve your weight loss goals.

title: Good app
body: I have been using it to track my calories, works great. My favorite part is that I get to scan barcodes of products on my daily intake notes, most products are scannable. I recommend this app for anyone wanting to watch what they are eating!

title: Diet and Exercise
body: This app is a great diet monitor. I particularly like the barcode scanning feature so I can catalog everything I eat. Unfortunately I find the exercise data to be a little lacking. But I fully anticipate that with more time and updates it will get better. Loving this app.

title: They scammed me
body: I went to purchase the promotional membership price of four dollars or at least that's what they said you would pay. So I did it, and they took 50 dollars out of my account. When seeking support to fix the problem there has been no response, every time I go to send a email it says "cannot process right now" do not get sucked into there fake promotional price. They will just  charge you full price.

title: Great app
body: The app is great. The only thing I didn't like was that I had to purchase the gold package in order to add more recipes/food but it's so cheap if you do the full year that it's worth it. I feel as if I'm doing pretty good with my calorie intake. ðŸ‘ðŸ½ðŸ‘ðŸ½

title: I LOVE IT
body: this app is amazing. I am about 3 1/2 weeks in and so far, I have lost 5 pounds and I'm super happy with my process. I love the little reminders and encouragements this app provides to keep you motivated. 10/10 would recommend

title: Totally worth paying for!
body: I upgraded my Lifesum to get the speciality diets - currently doing "Fat-Burner Light" and it's amazing to be able to see where I'm with my macros and it gives great tips and recipes for helping to cut cravings and stay on track.

title: This makes me set goals and keep them
body: Practical, user friendly. This app helps me keep track of my calorie intake and gives me the organization and motivation to lose wait.

title: Steps =/= Calories
body: The step to calories on the exercise portion of the app seems to be off. I walk 27 steps and it says I burned 57 calories. By the end of the day it says I burned 1000+ calories just by walking which isn't accurate. I usually get 500 tops. It really messes up the calorie counting and makes me feel like I'm losing track.

title: Love the app but...
body: This app is great for tracking all my healthy food and keeping up with my calories, but recently, I tried to update my weight and it wouldn't let me select a weight above 9 lbs. I could only select 0.1-9.9 lbs so right now, apparently, I weigh 1.3 pounds. Please fix this!!
response: Thank you for your review and apologies for this issue! Can you please contact us at contact@lifesum.com with more details about this so we can find a solution? Thanks!

title: Disappointing
body: I really liked the app before I downloaded the update. Now meals disappear and the calendar gets messed up for past days. I also can't find the custom calorie option anymore. The barcode scan is not working properly, won't scan products anymore that worked before. For me the app became pretty much useless because I can't count on the data anymore that I put in. I'm really disappointed.

title: Not at all intuitive
body: I was a Gold member of the old ShapeUp club for two years, then went into hibernation for a year.  When I returned to Lifesum, although the appearances look prettier, the product is almost impossible to use intuitively.  There are also many, many, just bugs (e.g. selecting US measurements but seeing only Kg in weight and food values.  The product has declined in usefulness over the last year and I had to give up using it.

title: Decent but downgrades usability to push Gold membership
body: I wanted to use this app to track calories and not to do one of their diets. It's fine that they push the Gold membership on you, but what isn't cool is that they hamper the usability by only letting Gold member do a quick add of their recent or

title: Bugs everywhere!
body: I signed up for the Gold Account and used it for 2 days and was disappointed at the number of bugs I encountered. Some highlights: Water Intake automatically setting itself to 8 cups, Meals being duplicated, daily calorie allowance changing for no reason, inaccurate weight chart showing current weight duplicated... Don't waste your time with this app and definitely don't waste your time and money upgrading to Gold!

title: Doesn't save data
body: Latest version is really buggy. When you enter exercise and water, they aren't saved to the right day. Often the app saves them to the day before, and when you try to correct them you'll see them doubled up on another day. Very frustrating for paid subscriber. Won't renew if this isn't fixed.

title: Idea!
body: What if you had a disease that affected your health? Wouldn't that change your lifestyle? Add a setting for that, and let the users type in their health issue! It would make their diet and stuff change so that it would make more sense! Just an idea.

title: Love
body: This is the only app where im able to track my food for weeks before getting bored. Other ones i used to quit within a week or two.

title: MyFitnessPal wannabe
body: It is way prettier than MFP, that's for sure. Not sure if it's easier to work and navigate since I've been using MFP for over a year now, but it wasn't too tough to figure out. My problem is that 1) to lean out it had me eating too few calories for my output level and had me eating 50% Carbs/30% Fat/20 % Protein (anyone that tracks macros knows that's way too little protein) and 2) I couldn't customize my macro goals.
response: Please contact us at contact@lifesum.com! We would like to look further into this and see how we can help you out with this!

title: Great but expensive
